AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: starting point of the journey, city located on the US-Mexico border with high smuggling activity
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 359: alternative route, highway with checkpoints that smugglers try to avoid
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville: location with a checkpoint, origin of Defendant's journey
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: route taken by the defendants, rural area with limited traffic, mostly used by local residents and workers, where vehicles with out-of-town registrations raised suspicions, frequently used as a smuggling route
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: part of the route, highway that travels in a northeasterly direction from Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruni: destination, possible drop-off point for undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ranchitos Las Lomas: possible origin of the journey, location on U.S. 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.FM 2895: alternative route to Bruni, Farm-to-Market Road that provides a more direct route to Bruni than FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville checkpoint: checkpoint on U.S. 359 that smugglers try to avoid
